Articles.Content:
Mini-plugin which allows detaching ship parts that are obscured (in VAB/SPH screens). Position the mouse somewhere over the obscured part and use Control+MiddleClick (a menu will be shown - see screenshot). The shortcut can be configured to anything else (see config.conf after unpacking the .zip file).

  • Download: vabhelper-0.1.1.zip
  • Current version: 0.1.1
  • Author: mareolan
  • Source code: https://github.com/mareolan/VABHelper
  • MIT license

Notes

  • Using Alt in the shortcut is discouraged as it seems to collide with the functionality of the editor (Alt+Click in KSP duplicates the selected parts).
